committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds

official_title: A bill to designate the United States Courthouse Building in Hato Rey Puerto Rico, as the "Clemente Ruiz Nazario Courthouse".

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Designates the U.S. Courthouse Building in Hato Rey, Puerto Rico, as the Clemente Ruiz Nazario United States Courthouse.

titles.title: A bill to designate the United States Courthouse Building in Hato Rey Puerto Rico, as the "Clemente Ruiz Nazario Courthouse".
